item.title: Mode Control Panel Switches – ALT HOLD

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided procedures do not require their use.

numlitem.para: For RVSM en route operations, any one of the following autopilot modes will provide acceptable altitude hold capability:
Vertical Navigation (VNAV) with FMC flight plan.
VNAV with FMC flight plan with altitude intervention.
Use operative vertical modes to follow desired flight path.
Use V/S for unplanned level off.
Use V/S for level off at MDA.

placard.para: Placard ALT HOLD Switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
